Package com.spectralogic.ds3client.helpers

This package contains helper methods to automate common operations within the SDK.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChecksumFunction  
    ChecksumListener  
    DataTransferredListener  
    Ds3ClientHelpers.Job
    Represents a bulk job operation.
    Ds3ClientHelpers.ObjectChannelBuilder  
    FailureEventListener  
    FileSystemHelper  
    JobPartTracker
    This class manages parts for all of the objects in the job.
    MetadataAccess  
    MetadataReceivedListener  
    ObjectCompletedListener  
    WaitingForChunksListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ds3ClientHelpers
    A wrapper around the Ds3Client which automates common tasks.
    ExceptionClassifier  
    FileObjectGetter
    Writes files to the local file system preserving the path.
    FileObjectPutter
    Writes files to a remote DS3 appliance from a directory in the local filesystem.
    FolderNameFilter  
    JobPart
    A class that associates a blob with the Black Pearl on which it resides.
    JobPartTrackerFactory  
    JobPartTrackerImpl  
    JobState  
    ObjectChannelBuilderLogger

    WriteJobImpl  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ObjectStorageSpaceVerificationResult.VerificationStatus  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JobRecoveryException  
    JobRecoveryNotActiveException
    This exception represents a failure of an attempted recovery of a job performed using Ds3ClientHelpers.recoverReadJob(UUID) or Ds3ClientHelpers.recoverWriteJob(UUID) that is caused by the specified job not being active.
    JobRecoveryTypeException
    This exception is thrown when an attempted recover is performed using Ds3ClientHelpers and the JobRequestType of the specified job does not match the type of recovery to be performed.
    RecoverableIOException
    A RecoverableIOException is used to classify IOExceptions into one of 2 types: those that should result in retrying a data transfer, such as a failure in an HTTP GET or PUT; and those that should not result in retrying a data transfer, such as a failure writing to or reading from a file.
    TruncateNotAllowedException  
    UnrecoverableIOException
    An UnrecoverableIOException is used to classify IOExceptions into one of 2 types: those that should result in retrying a data transfer, such as a failure in an HTTP GET or PUT; and those that should not result in retrying a data transfer, such as a failure writing to or reading from a file.

Package com.spectralogic.ds3client.helpers Description

This package contains helper methods to automate common operations within the SDK.
